body.p: {{tp9|Your task is to select sentence parts, words, word parts, syllables or characters. Proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli28|Place the mouse cursor over the item (sentence part, word, word part, syllable or character) you wish to select.}}
{{tli29|Left click the item, it will be marked (selected).}}

body.p: {{tp10|To cancel your selection click on selected item again.}}
